mn103:2.3_0: “Na kho no, bhante, bhagavati evaṁ hoti:

mn103:15.1_1: samaggānaṁ sammodamānānaṁ avivadamānānaṁ sikkhataṁ aññamaññassa vacīsaṁhāro uppajjeyya diṭṭhipaḷāso cetaso āghāto appaccayo anabhiraddhi.
mn103:15.2_0: Tattha ekatopakkhikānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ yaṁ bhikkhuṁ suvacataraṁ maññeyyātha so upasaṅkamitvā evamassa vacanīyo:

mn103:15.4_0: Sammā byākaramāno, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evaṁ byākareyya:
mn103:15.5_1: amhākaṁ samaggānaṁ sammodamānānaṁ avivadamānānaṁ sikkhataṁ aññamaññassa vacīsaṁhāro uppanno diṭṭhipaḷāso cetaso āghāto appaccayo anabhiraddhi,
mn103:15.7_0: Sammā byākaramāno, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evaṁ byākareyya:

mn103:16.2_1: amhākaṁ samaggānaṁ sammodamānānaṁ avivadamānānaṁ sikkhataṁ aññamaññassa vacīsaṁhāro uppanno diṭṭhipaḷāso cetaso āghāto appaccayo anabhiraddhi,
mn103:16.3_0: Sammā byākaramāno, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evaṁ byākareyya:
mn103:16.4_1: amhākaṁ samaggānaṁ sammodamānānaṁ avivadamānānaṁ sikkhataṁ aññamaññassa vacīsaṁhāro uppanno diṭṭhipaḷāso cetaso āghāto appaccayo anabhiraddhi taṁ jānamāno samaṇo garaheyyāti.
mn103:16.6_0: Sammā byākaramāno, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evaṁ byākareyya:
mn103:17.1_0: Tañce, bhikkhave, bhikkhuṁ pare evaṁ puccheyyuṁ:
mn103:17.2_0: ‘āyasmatā no ete bhikkhū akusalā vuṭṭhāpetvā kusale patiṭṭhāpitā’ti?
mn103:17.3_0: Sammā byākaramāno, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evaṁ byākareyya:
mn103:17.4_2: tāhaṁ dhammaṁ sutvā tesaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ abhāsiṁ.
mn103:17.5_0: Taṁ te bhikkhū dhammaṁ sutvā akusalā vuṭṭhahiṁsu, kusale patiṭṭhahiṁsū’ti.
mn103:17.6_1: bhikkhu na ceva attānaṁ ukkaṁseti, na paraṁ vambheti,
mn103:17.6_3: na ca koci sahadhammiko vādānuvādo gārayhaṁ ṭhānaṁ āgacchatī”ti.
mn103:17.8_0: Attamanā te bhikkhū bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinandunti.
